document.full_text: democrats in the wisconsin state senate returned to the chamber for the first time in more than six weeks on tuesday to help approve republican governor scott walker's plan to close a gap in the state budget for the current fiscal year.
document.title: wisconsin senate approve bond restructuring bill
lines_and_colors: democrats in the wisconsin state senate returned to the chamber for the first time in more than six weeks on tuesday to help approve republican governor scott walker's plan to close a gap in the state budget for the current fiscal year.
